benefits.title: Fresh & Flavorful
benefits.description: Enjoy the superior taste of freshly picked produce

benefits.title: Eco-Friendly
benefits.description: Lower your carbon footprint by reducing the need for transportation and packaging

benefits.title: Stress Relief
benefits.description: Gardening reduces stress and promotes relaxation

benefits.title: Healthier Food
benefits.description: Homegrown fruits and vegetables are fresher and packed with more nutrients

benefits.title: Family Time
benefits.description: Gardening together strengthens family bonds and creates lasting memories

benefits.title: Help Bees
benefits.description: Growing flowers and plants supports bees and other pollinators, crucial for ecosystem health

benefits.title: Save Money
benefits.description: Reduce your grocery bills by harvesting your own produce
